assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Jill E. Stopfer reports personal fees from Astra Zeneca. Rachel A. Pozzar, Fangxin Hong, Niya Xiong, Manan M. Nayak, and Meghan Underhill-Blazey have no conflict of interest to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Dana-Farber/Harvard Cancer Center Institutional Review Board approved the study protocol.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.
